Text: Hi, How can I help you?
Hi.
I am having problems with my internet.
Can I first verify your account before we move on?
Yeah, no problem.
What is your first and last name?
My name is Shambria Richardson
Thank you Shambria.
Can you verify your account id?
Thank you
I see your account details, your modem signals look good.
What kind of issues are you having?
My internet is going very slow
I see you are on our 5 mega bite service
That's not what I asked for.
I was supposed to have the 50 package
Your account details do in fact say you are supposed to have the 50
I will just adjust the code in our system to match your package
Thank you
No problem mam.
I sent a signal to your modem, you should see it restart in a moment
It just turned off and on again
When it comes back on, can you go to speedtest.net and perform a speed test?
Doing it now.
It says 52 down and 23 up.
Those speeds are great.  You should expect about a 50 download and 20 upload
Do you have any other issues?
No, that is all.
Thank you for calling Xfinity
Goodbye
Goodbye
